title: Uruguay & Chile -\> Christmas postcards
content:
Hola!

aquí podran ver los resultados de un intercambio tipográfico Chile-Uruguay

[http://www.tipografia-montevideo.info/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123033605/http:/www.tipografia-montevideo.info/ "http://www.tipografia-montevideo.info/")

Feliz año!

\* Hi!

Here you’ll see the results of a typographic exchange between Chile-Uruguay

[http://www.tipografia-montevideo.info/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123033605/http:/www.tipografia-montevideo.info/ "http://www.tipografia-montevideo.info/")

Hapy new year!

Ferch

 [‹ Jargon help](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123033605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40305 "Go to previous forum topic") [Typetools (hot or not) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123033605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40298 "Go to next forum topic")
author: strass

comments.content:
Some good looking work there!

Happy New Year!

ChrisL

thx chris :)

Happy New Year

2008 awaits, new typogrphic thoughts!

[Tipografía-Montevideo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123033605/http:/www.tipografia-montevideo.info/)

Very vibrant and exciting work, Fernando!

Chris, is thare a branch of your family down in South America as [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123033605/http:/postales.uniondelostipografos.org/pages/rimona_rebolledo.html) suggests? ;)

LOL!!! No, that person can’t be part of my family, he has too much hair :-)

ChrisL

Lindo este intercambio entre los diseñadores Chilenos y los Uruguayos.

Divertido es el comentario de writingdesigning, porque él parece tanto a Jesucristo. Ji ji!

Como dicen los Chilenos, feliz pascua.

Textwrap:

But then, some people have for years been saying [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123033605/http:/reluctant-messenger.com/issa.htm)
